ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Gemstones
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v0.4-b.1[/h1]
This mod adds 11 new gemstones, as well as the worktables (requires research) needed to craft the uncut gems into cut gems.
Raw gemstones can be used to craft stuffable furniture and blunt weapons the same way jade works in vanilla. The cut gemstones worth more than their uncut variants and are used in trading and creation of certain ceremonial objects.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]11 Gemstones (x11 Rough/x11 Cut) [*]2 Worktables (Unpowered/Powered) [*]2 Researches (Unlocks Worktables) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Specific Issues Known. [*]Probably won't play well with other gem mods without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but can be obtained through trades and from salvaging certain objects.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]SirLalaPyon for his amazing, high quality vanilla styled art. [/list]
[h1]Latest Changes:[/h1] [b]v0.3-b.2b[/b] [list] [*][Buff] Reduced Crafting skill requirement for gem cutting from 8 to 6. [/list]
[b]v0.3-b.3[/b] [list] [*][Fix] Rough Ruby will now be cut into Ruby instead of Diamond. [/list]
[b]v0.3-b.4[/b] [list] [*][Fix] Gem trading for all traders are now enabled. [*][Change] Rough Gemstone value increased from 5 -> 10. [*][Change] Cut Gemstone value increased from 8 -> 25. [*][Buff] Cut Gemstone is now worth double the royal favor to Royal Tribute Collectors. [*][Nerf] Rough Gemstone mining yield decreased from 36 -> 12. [/list]
[b]v0.4-b.1[/b] [list] [*][RimWorld 1.3] RimWorld 1.3 Ready. [/list]
